caption.p: Proposed molecular mechanisms of anti-diabetic and anti-obesity actions of Schisandra chinensis in different organs and adipose tissue. See main text for more details. ACC—acetyl-CoA carboxylase; C/EBPβ/α—CCAAT/enhancer-binding protein alpha; CAT—catalase; FAS—fatty acid synthase; GLUT2, 4—glucose transporter 2, 4; GSIS—glucose stimulated insulin secretion; HSL—hormone sensitive lipase; IR—insulin receptor; LXR α—liver X receptor α; PKA—protein kinase A; PTP1B—protein tyrosine phosphatase 1B; ROS—reactive oxygen species; SOD—superoxide dismutase; SREBP-1c—sterol regulatory element binding protein 1c; and TG—triglyceride.
